name: markdown-to-email
description: Translate 'Markdown' Syntax into HTML For Email Newsletters

scripts.parse: npm run checkFolders && cross-env PARSE=full node ./src/parser
scripts.parseNoAdv: npm run checkFolders && cross-env PARSE=noAdv node ./src/parser
scripts.parse:full: npm run checkFolders && cross-env PARSE=full node ./src/parser
scripts.parseReact: npm run checkFolders && cross-env PARSE=reactContentOnly node ./src/parser
scripts.parseReact:full: npm run checkFolders && cross-env PARSE=reactFull node ./src/parser

author: hirdbluebird, atherdon, vadim9999
